question.title: Spring HTTP Interface - comma separated list of parameter values
question.body:
I have the following @HttpExchange in Spring:

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.service.annotation.GetExchange;

...

    @GetExchange("/foo/bar")
    List<Baz> items(
            @RequestParam(name = "ids") List<String> ids
    );

When I execute it, ids are sent like this:

ids=1&ids=2&...

However, I need them to be sent as follows:

ids=1,2,...

I wonder if there is a Spring native way to send them as comma-separated values.

Currently, when I call this method, I need to prepare IDs in the following way:

String.join(",", ids);
